tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crop_yield_data (
    crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name TEXT,
    yield_amount INT,
    planting_date DATE,
    planting_location TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE crop_yield_data (
    crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(255),
    crop_yield INT,
    planting_date DATE,
    harvesting_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE field_data (
    field_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    field_name VARCHAR(255),
    field_size INT,
    soil_type VARCHAR(50),
    crop_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE productivity_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    planting_season VARCHAR(50),
    productivity_score INT,
    analysis_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE crop_yield_data (
    crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name VARCHAR(255),
    yield_amount DECIMAL,
    planting_date DATE,
    harvest_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE productivity_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_id INT,
    season_id INT,
    yield_amount DECIMAL,
    productivity_index DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE weather_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL,
    precipitation DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE farm_location (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    farm_name TEXT,
    address TEXT,
    city TEXT,
    state TEXT,
    zip_code TEXT
);
